event_name: ADGM FSRA consults on stablecoins (Crypto Asset) regime incl. fiat-referenced tokens
ADGM FSRA publishes stablecoin/Fiat Referenced Token framework (Crypto Token Regime update)
Treasury consultation: Payments System Modernisation – includes Payment Stablecoins under SVF
CBB consults on new stablecoin regulatory framework (SIO Module)
CBB issues final Stablecoin Regulatory Framework (SIO Module)
BMA consults on Single Currency Pegged Stablecoins (SCPS) Guidance
BMA issues final Guidance on Single Currency Pegged Stablecoins
BCB press note on next steps for cryptoasset/VASP regulation (payment use cases included)
OSFI consults on FRCA (fiat-referenced cryptoassets) capital/liquidity treatment
OSFI publishes final guidelines on crypto-asset exposures (incl. FRCA)
Joint notice: further preventive measures on virtual currency trading and speculation (ban)
VARA issues Virtual Assets and Related Activities Regulations 2023 (incl. FRVA Issuance Rules)
scope: Virtual assets incl. fiat-referenced virtual assets (stablecoins)

event_name: VARA updates Virtual Asset Issuance Rulebook (Annex on Fiat-Referenced Virtual Assets)
MiCA Titles III & IV apply (EMT/ART)
reference_currency_examples: EUR and non-EU currencies (per EBA ITS for non-EU currencies)

event_name: EBA consults on ITS for reporting ARTs/EMTs denominated in non-EU currency
Payment Services Act amendments on stablecoins enforced; travel rule applies to stablecoins
reference_currency_examples: JPY and foreign currency-pegged stablecoins via intermediaries

event_name: MAS finalises stablecoin regulatory framework
Virtual Asset User Protection Act passed
Virtual Asset User Protection Act effective
FINMA publishes stablecoin guidelines (supplement to ICO guidelines)
FINMA Guidance 06/2024 on stablecoins and bank guarantees
BOT policy on baht-backed stablecoins; classification and requirement to consult BOT
Central Bank regulation prohibits use of cryptoassets in payments
SPK issues Communiqué on Crypto Asset Service Providers (licensing framework)
BoE & FCA publish DP on regulating stablecoins
HMT publishes draft SI to bring fiat-backed stablecoins into payments regulation (Phase 1)
NYDFS Guidance on issuance of USD-backed stablecoins (redeemability, reserves, attestation)
OCC Interpretive Letter 1183 reaffirms permissibility of certain stablecoin activities by national banks
PWG/FDIC/OCC Report on Stablecoins
